body.name: Chandler Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit, Wire Brush Graphite Gray Finish, GreenGuard Gold Certified

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 45 mins
features: SAFETY FIRST: Soho Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

COMPATIBILITY: This Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit is compatible with the Soho Baby Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (44011530) and should be used as your child becomes independent and transitions from crib, toddler bed, or daybed into a full-size bed

PREMIUM QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers and backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty, this Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Soho Baby Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification; GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage

COMPLETE NURSERY COLLECTION: The Chandler Collection by Soho Baby in Graphite Gray features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (44011530), 2-Drawer Nightstand (44022530), 5-Drawer Dresser (44035530), 6-Drawer Dresser (44036530), Changing Topper (44065530), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (44095530), Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (44088530), and Soho Baby Crib Mattress, sold separately; The Chandler Collection is available in Graphite Gray and Stone Wash finishes
body.description: Soho Baby nursery furniture boasts sophistication and luxury while adding style to your baby's room for years to come. Made from solid woods and wood veneers, Soho Baby furniture is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby. The Soho Baby Chandler Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit is thoughtfully designed to extend the life of the Soho Baby Chandler 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (44011530). With the included hardware, simply attach the crib headboard and footboard to the coordinating side rails and place the included five slats across. Convert to a full-size bed as your child becomes independent and transitions from crib, toddler bed, or daybed into a full-size bed. The use of a Bunkie Board or box spring with this conversion kit is recommended and sold separately. This Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly. The Conversion Kit measures 76.00 W x 2.00 in. D x 5.00 in. H (22.00 lbs.) and can accommodate up to 400 pounds when used as a full-size bed. This Conversion Kit is backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty. The Chandler Collection by Soho Baby in Graphite Gray features a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (44011530), 2-Drawer Nightstand (44022530), 5-Drawer Dresser (44035530), 6-Drawer Dresser (44036530), Changing Topper (44065530), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (44095530), Full-Size Bed Conversion Kit (44088530), and Soho Baby Crib Mattress, sold separately. The Chandler Collection is available in Graphite Gray and Stone Wash finishes. The Soho Baby Chandler Crib to Full-Size Bed Conversion kit has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD GOLD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.
